revised_title: Verification of a Copy of the Imperial Standard Yard for the Royal Society
tldr: Captain Henry Kater constructs and verifies a copy of the Imperial Standard Yard for the Royal Society, using a marble slab and a scale with fine gold dots for divisions. The comparisons were made using a microscope, and the results show a high degree of accuracy, with the greatest difference between any one of the comparisons and the mean being less than two ten-thousandths of an inch.
